title: An Act designating the Marion Stoddart riverwalk

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Scarsdale of Pepperell and Senator Cronin, a joint petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Margaret R. Scarsdale that the Department of Conservation and Recreation be authorized to designate a certain trail lin the J. Harry Rich State Forest in the town of Groton as the Marion Stoddart riverwalk.  Environment and Natural Resources.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Environment and Natural Resources
